project.name: Gyanmarg
project.description: Gamified learning platform for ebook collection

content-builder.description: Extract and structure content from ebooks into lessons and pathways
content-builder.use_when: User wants to add content from a book or create lessons

component-builder.description: Build React components following atomic design patterns
component-builder.use_when: User wants to create new UI components

quiz-designer.description: Create quizzes, assessments, and flashcards based on content
quiz-designer.use_when: User wants to create quizzes or flashcards

feature-architect.description: Design and implement new features for the learning platform
feature-architect.use_when: User wants to add a new major feature

pathway-designer.description: Design complete learning pathways with proper progression
pathway-designer.use_when: User wants to create a full module pathway

code-reviewer.description: Review code for TypeScript best practices and project conventions
code-reviewer.use_when: User wants to review code quality
